attributes.action: Lower bus prices for students still in further education from the ages of 16 to 18.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The price of bus fare to travel to school before 9 in the morning is too high! 

We feel its wrong that we are charged adult fares when we are not adults and are still in full time education. 

The price for an adult return is £5.60. Where as a child is £3.50.
